base_description: Rectangular, gray remote control with black buttons.
part_description: Features multiple black buttons arranged in rows on a rectangular gray body. Blue buttons are positioned at the top. The buttons vary in size and shape, with some rectangular and others circular.
internal_interaction_description: The buttons interact with the internal circuit board to send signals when pressed. Each button corresponds to a specific function, activating different electronic components within the remote to transmit infrared signals.
external_interaction_description: The remote interacts with electronic devices like TVs or audio systems by sending infrared signals when buttons are pressed. It requires a line of sight to the device's sensor and is typically operated by hand, responding to user inputs to control the device.
